Glance


The world as your fashion consultant

Ever have a hard time deciding which outfit to buy? Tired of wearing last year's trends?

Meet Glance, a sleek little Android app that helps you pick an outfit and find new looks.

Check out our VC pitch slide deck

How it works

How it works

Snap two photos of outfits you're deciding between

Add a caption and choose who you want votes from

Post your Glance and get votes on the better outfit within minutes

Every time you vote on 10 Glances from other users, you can post one of your own

Screenshots

Add an outfit
Take a photo or pick one from the gallery
Customize your Glance
Add a caption and set the vote filter
Get feedback
See which outfit voters prefer

Android frontend
